    • Method Detail

      • getInterconnections

        public java.util.List<Interconnection> getInterconnections(java.lang.String departure,
                                                           java.lang.String arrival,
                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime departureDateTime,
                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime arrivalDateTime,
                                                           int numStops)
        This functions receives the departure and arrival IATA codes and DateTime besides the number of stops. Retrieves the routes available between origin and destination from Ryanair. Then retrieves the suitable legs for the available routes.
        Parameters:
        departure - IATA code for the departure airport
        arrival - IATA code for the arrival airport
        departureDateTime - LocalDateTime for the departure. No flight should leave before this date and time.
        arrivalDateTime - LocalDateTime for the arrival. No flight should arrive after this date time.
        numStops - maximum number of stops for the route
        Returns:
        a list of interconnections satisfying the requested logic
